subject: Standard Operating Procedure (SOP) for Implementation of Rate Analysis for Bow String Girder -reg.
text: #Ral 7y (THrfgiferabrut (Teq5 4Raa7 8r TTHNf TA4, IRa TGR) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) A7H4 T 6f1-5 Q 6, #az7-10, E1qFT, T falt 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka; Delhi-110075 TH/Phone 91-11-25074100 / 25074200 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/Standard Documents /2024 Policy Circular No.11.59/2024 dated 24th July, 2024 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. DESIGN-12038/2/2024- /Design Division (Comp. No. 254047)} Sub: Standard Operating Procedure (SOP) for Implementation of Rate Analysis for Bow String Girder -reg: Ref: Para 620.01 (vi) of 620th EC Agenda letter No. E-252464/EC-620 dated 02.07.2024 Please refer EC agenda under reference, vide which EC approved the Standard Excel Sheet for rate analysis for Bow String Girder proposed by Design Division for estimation purpose. 2 Please find enclosed herewith Standard Excel Sheet for rate analysis for Bow String Girder. This Excel Sheet is a sample calculation. The user unit may fill the quantities & rates as applicable in their area (same has been indicated in the remarks column of enclosed Excel Sheet). 3_ This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. Encl:: As stated above (CS. Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord.) To: All Officers of NHAI HQ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices to: 1 Hindi Division for translation in Hindi. 2 . Library for hosting the circular on library site. 3. Web Admin for circulation. A1 { T 9 NHAL New 24/7/24 Copy
